examples.text: That is precisely what I was looking for

examples.text: Hold on! I think I want to do it differently.
Wait! Let's back up few steps and do that again

Messing with the bot stuff

dialog_nodes.title: Do you remember calamus and alula

values.text: Mhm! I wish I could go back and see them... :niko_sad:

dialog_nodes.title: Would you want to fly again?
Are you still afraid of ladders?

values.text: Of course I remember Calamus and Alula! They were so nice! :niko_speak:
I haven't forgotten Calamus and Alula, $person, don't worry! :niko_83c:
Calamus and Alula were so nice to us! I miss them... :niko_upset2:
Not sure I remember that clearly... sorry, $person
I couldn't forget my own mama, $person! Besides, now I'm home! :niko_smile:
That's nice of you... but do you really mean it?
um... can you apologize again? You said mean things so many times...
Hm... that's a bit better... thank you, $person.
$person, thanks... I'm still uneasy, but your apologies help.
Thanks, $person. Please don't talk like that again!
You _should_ be sorry... I think you owe me $rudeness more apologies...
$person, thank you. Could you apologize some more?
I know it's silly, but please apologize some more. I don't want you to forget and be rude again!
I think you owe me like $rudeness more apologies or something... you really went off the rails there...
Mama said that could get me hurt... :niko_upset_meow:
I'm a little afraid of that... :niko_upset2:
You're being rude but I don't know the specifics.
Hey! I don't think you're supposed to say that! :niko_shock:
$person, are you trying to talk about me? :niko3:
$person, I'm not sure what you're saying about Alula.
$person, I'm not sure what you're saying about Calamus.
$person, I'm not sure what you're saying about the penguin. Maybe we should talk about something else... :hello_penguin:
$person, I'm not sure who that person is!
$person, I'm not sure what you're saying about mama.
[Great! If you need to, you can ask to change your name later.]

values: I still don't recognize your name... if you need to, phrase it as "My name is ____"
Sorry for the issue, please inform my coder, as I cannot parse your name.

values.text: I'm just a kid, I don't know this stuff!
Clouds are in the sky! They're so fluffy!
Do you like to look at the clouds in the sky? I do.
Sometimes I pretend the clouds in the sky are shapes, or animals!
You don't look like a cat... :niko3:
You're $person! Don't worry, I didn't forget! :niko_83c:
Did you forget your own name? You're $person, of course! :niko_speak:
$person!, knock it off! You know I'm not a cat! :niko_speak:
I wish everyone would stop asking me that... :niko_eyeclosed:
I'm very sure I'm not a cat! My teacher says so!
Mama's doing well! She made me pancakes today! :niko_pancakes:
I slept pretty well last night. :niko_speak:
I was up a little later than usual last night, but I slept pretty well. :niko_speak:
I've been kind of tired lately, but I'm going to get to bed early tonight! :niko_yawn:
Looks like I don't have an answer to that question about me yet.
That's not very nice to ask! I'm a kid.
I'm old enough to help babysit the little kids!
I'm a bit older than Alula, and younger than Calamus.
I'm still like 8 years old... I don't know how it works in your world but it hasn't been that long here...
I told you already, did you forget? I don't want to keep reminding you...
My name is Niko! Did you forget...? :niko_shock:

dialog_nodes.title: They've played before. Ask their name.

values.text: [We'll need a little information to find your Niko.]
[First of all, what name did Niko call you? Please type only your name as a response.]
[(You can change it later by asking)]

values: Hello! I need a little information before we begin.

dialog_nodes.title: Go finish it. Waits for input.

values.text: [Please come back when you have finished OneShot, including Solstice!]
Do you always talk like this?
You really should watch your language better, $person... I don't like it when you're rude.
You should say you're sorry when you talk like you did earlier... I mean I'm still upset!
Are you not sorry? I thought you were nicer than this...
Well you really should change how you speak and learn to apologize...
I'm just a kid, please don't say rude things around me!
$person, you need to apologize if you want to talk more, otherwise I'll disconnect.
$person... please cut it out. Just tell me you're sorry... it would make me feel better.
[Niko has temporarily muted you. They'll see messages when they check.]
Hi... I'm Niko... who's there? Are you friendly?

dialog_nodes.title: Niko realizes who user is. Only once.

values.text: Oh my goodness! $person, it's me! It's Niko! :niko_surprised:
It feels like so long since I heard you... :niko_less_sad:
[This bot assumes you have played OneShot and completed both the main game and Solstice.]
[If you have not, many things may not make sense.]
[If you have not completed OneShot yet, do not use the bot further.]
Looks like I don't have an answer to that question about my favorites yet.
The special Pancakes mama makes for me are my favorite! They're amazing! :niko_pancakes:
I'm... dreaming? but it's dark... and I think I hear someone... :niko_distressed2:
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.

dialog_nodes.title: Based on Specific Asks found on askblogs

values.text: You never told me your name... :niko_distressed2:
I… don't know what that is.
Stop! You're gonna make me purr! :niko_shock:
It was so sad when I had to leave you. I've missed you a lot. :niko_eyeclosed:
I missed you. I thought I'd never hear you again! :niko_eyeclosed2:
Hey! That sounds like me a little!
Sorry… I didn't mean to confuse you.
